pr_title: NMS-12842: Remote Poller: add remote outages to UI

timeline.bodyText: @christianpape I'm not sure from where do we get the perspective location?
timeline.author: patrick-schweizer

replies.bodyText: The PR #3073 isn't merged to features/rpwm yet. We are still waiting for the final approval of @indigo423 . You can of course base your branch off jira/NMS-12792.
replies.author: christianpape

+package org.opennms.web.filter;
+
+import org.hibernate.criterion.Criterion;
+import org.hibernate.criterion.Restrictions;
+
+/** Allows null as a valid value for not equals filtering. */
+public abstract class NotEqualsFilterNullAware<T> extends OneArgFilter<String> {

replies.bodyText: it is used by the NegativePerspectiveLocationFilter. I had to introduce this class to handle the NULL perspectives properly.
replies.author: patrick-schweizer

replies.bodyText: Sorry, I meant the <T> isn't used at all, right? This can be omitted, right?
replies.author: christianpape
